post.body: This is a clean site. I'm impressed.

comment.body: Actually I mean visually lol. Unlike most darknets zeronet looks fresh. There are evils everywhere. I'm impressed with zeronet because It seems the most likely to bring decentralization to normies.
@Piloth: Thanks. Wish I was a good enough developer to help out
